problem_text_cn: 将量角器按如图所示的方式放在一个残缺的玻璃碎片上,使点A在半圆上,点B、C的读数分别为105°、155°,则∠BAC的大小为()
problem_text_en: Place the protractor on a broken piece of glass as shown in the figure, so that point A is on a semicircle, and the readings of points B and C are N_0 and N_1 respectively, then the size of ∠BAC is ()
